mapper.select: SELECT st.*, ac.store_ceo FROM STORE st LEFT JOIN STORE_ACCOUNT ac ON st.store_idx = ac.store_idx WHERE st.store_idx = #{store_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into STORE_INFO_UPDATE ( su_idx, store_idx, su_name, su_tel, su_addr, su_daddr, su_ceo, su_state ) VALUES (SU_IDX_SEQ.nextval, #{store_idx}, #{su_name}, #{su_tel}, #{su_addr}, #{su_daddr}, #{su_ceo}, #{su_state} )
mapper.select: SELECT cate.*, cvalue.CATE_VALUE_NAME FROM CATEGORY cate LEFT JOIN CATE_VALUE cvalue ON cate.cate_value_idx = cvalue.cate_value_idx WHERE store_idx = #{store_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into STORE_GRID ( sg_idx, store_idx, store_floor, sg_row, sg_col ) VALUES (SG_IDX_SEQ.nextval, #{store_idx}, #{s_floor}, #{sg_row}, #{sg_col} )
mapper.select: SELECT SG_IDX FROM ( SELECT SG_IDX FROM STORE_GRID WHERE store_idx = #{store_idx} ORDER BY SG_IDX DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: insert into STORE_TABLE_SET ( sts_IDX, sg_idx, sts_location, sts_type_idx, sts_num, table_num ) VALUES (STS_IDX_SEQ.nextval, #{sg_idx}, #{sts_location}, #{sts_type_idx}, #{sts_num}, #{table_num} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store_table_set WHERE sg_idx = #{sg_idx} order by sts_idx
